Category: Mask

phyridium cruentum extract, Camellia Sinensis leaf Extract, Rosmarinus officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Honey Extract, Glycerin, Water (Aqua), Sodium Levulinate, Sodium Anisate, Phenoxyethanol

Directions: 1. Cleanse and dry your face thoroughly and unfold the sheet mask. 2. Remove the white protective layer gently. Place the mask with blue pro
book: 2714-Lacfin Facial Sheet Mask For Brides To Be

chunk: e mask with blue protective side facing outward. Apply from forehead down to your chin, align the openings provided in the mask with your eyes, nostrils, and mouth alike. 3. Peel off the blue protective layer. Smooth air bubbles toward edges, until it firmly adheres to the face. 4. Allow ingredients to absorb for 15 to 20 minutes before removing. A
book: 2714-Lacfin Facial Sheet Mask For Brides To Be

chunk:
s before removing. Avoid cleansing or rinsing the face after removing mask. Suggest Use: One facial sheet mask every other day.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
